title: app/jsLibs
description: JS libraries definitions for the loader.

path.description: A path to the lib file.

devPath.description: A path to the lib file for the developer mode.

exportsTo.description: If the lib exposes itself w/o a module, an object to which the lib is exported. Use dots to define a path.

exportsAs.description: A key name by which the lib is available in a containing object.

sourceMap.description: Whether the source map file is available.

exposeAs.description: If set, the lib will be exposed to the window object. A variable name the lib will be set to. To be used for backward compatibility reasons.

aliases.description: Additional module IDs the lib will be available by. Can be useful for establishing backward compatibility or when another lib requires this lib by a different ID.
